name: Raccoon Rascals
summary:
Ever wanted to play a game as a greedy raccoon, scaling the largest buildings ever built while collecting juicy pies on the way..? Well this game isn’t that.. Wait, yes it is, it’s just that and more!
Climb your way to the top in this addicting one button raccoon adventure! Featuring addicting single tap gameplay, 20+ characters to unlock, fun achievements, and more!
